tasks.label: Test All Tools
args: $tools = @('code_analyzer', 'mapping_analyzer', 'excel_exporter', 'version_tracker'); foreach ($tool in $tools) { Write-Host "Testing $tool..."; python "TOOLSET\$tool.py" --help | Select-Object -First 3; Write-Host "" }

tasks.label: Sync to Application Context
args: $outputPath = 'C:\Users\HP\Desktop\krabbel\tool-outputs\docs\ai-context'; Copy-Item -Path 'FIELD_REFERENCES.md' -Destination "$outputPath\conceptual-patterns.md" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Path 'README.md' -Destination "$outputPath\toolset-overview.md" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'AI context synced to application workspace'

tasks.label: Clean Large Submodules
args: $keep = @('CONFIGS/fastapi-configs', 'PROMPTS/awesome-prompts'); $all = git submodule status | ForEach-Object { ($_ -split '\s+')[2] }; foreach ($sub in $all) { if ($sub -notin $keep) { Write-Host "Removing $sub..."; git submodule deinit -f $sub; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $sub -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }

tasks.label: Toolset Health Check
args: Write-Host 'Toolset Status:' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'Tools:' -ForegroundColor Yellow; $tools = @('code_analyzer', 'mapping_analyzer', 'excel_exporter', 'version_tracker'); foreach ($tool in $tools) { if (Test-Path "TOOLSET\$tool.py") { Write-Host "✓ $tool.py" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host "❌ $tool.py" -ForegroundColor Red } }; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'Batch Wrappers:' -ForegroundColor Yellow; foreach ($tool in $tools) { if (Test-Path "TOOLSET\$tool.bat") { Write-Host "✓ $tool.bat" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host "❌ $tool.bat" -ForegroundColor Red } }; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'Key Collections:' -ForegroundColor Yellow; $collections = @('CONFIGS/fastapi-configs', 'PROMPTS/awesome-prompts'); foreach ($col in $collections) { if ((git submodule status $col 2>$null) -match '^\s*[a-f0-9]') { Write-Host "✓ $col" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host "❌ $col" -ForegroundColor Red } }
